http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif NERC-DIAMOND List NERC-DIAMOND List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=NERC-DIAMOND&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=NERC-DIAMOND.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-06-25T13:13:25Z Parsons, Andy 2014-06-25T15:13:09+01:00 2014-06-25T15:13:09+01:00 FW: Diamond and the Capital Consultation Exercise https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-DIAMOND;516ced7f.1406 Apologies if you have already received this via another route.<br><br>From: Diamond Light Source Communications [mailto:diamondcommunications@diamond.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 13 June 2014 14:14<br>Subject: Developing Diamond: Keeping the UK at the forefront of science with synchrotrons<br><br>Dear all,<br><br>The Government\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds consultation on the \ufffd\ufffd7bn capital investment in science and research over the next five years is now well underway and there are just over 3 weeks left for all those with an interest in the future of science in the UK to have their say on where capital investment should be channelled in the coming years. [...] Michelle Manning 2014-06-04T14:09:17+01:00 2014-06-04T14:09:17+01:00 Opportunity to feed into Large Facilities Requirements https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=NERC-DIAMOND;920fb5a9.1406 NERC SCIENTISTS ASKED TO IDENTIFY FUTURE FACILITY SCIENCE REQUIREMENTS THROUGH A LARGE FACILITY REQUIREMENTS SURVEY<br><br>UK researchers have until 16 June to provide their views on the future development of the country\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds large scale research facilities.<br>The Research Councils UK (RCUK) survey seeks scientific advice on the future development of the Central Laser Facility, ISIS Neutron Source, and the Diamond Light Source \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd all located at the Rutherford Appleton Laboratory at Harwell Oxford. [...]
